alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 22 at 12:01AM EST until January 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Significant icing up to an additional one-tenth inch. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Carolina and southeast North Carolina. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry
